subject: order cancellation
description_text:
Hi, i ordered the wrong pedals by mistake, is it possible to cancel the
order?
order number SSN2555

conversations.body_text: Sorry, your package has already been shipped. We are unable to cancel or amend your order at this stage.  https://www.sf-express.com/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF6045895643136
